entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pointe de l'Islet 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: S 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
